ShadowSiren:BluntDamage.NAME: Blunt
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deals #b50% more damage to targets with #yBlock.

ShadowSiren:ElectricDamage.NAME: Electric
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Arcs once when dealing unblocked damage, hitting a random enemy for #b50% of the damage dealt. NL #yBlock: Applies #yShock to the attacker when this Block is damaged. Used #bbefore other Block types.
#yActivate #yElectric, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yElectric #yDamage: Arcs once when dealing unblocked damage, hitting a random enemy for #b50% of the damage dealt.
#yBlock: Applies #yShock to the attacker when this Block is damaged. Used #bbefore other Block types.

ShadowSiren:FireDamage.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Gain #b3 #yVigor when dealing unblocked damage. NL #yBlock: Application scales with #yVigor, consuming it.
#yActivate #yFire, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yFire #yDamage: Gain #b3 #yVigor when dealing unblocked damage.
#yBlock: Application scales with #yVigor, consuming it.

ShadowSiren:IceDamage.NAME: Ice
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Applies #yChill on hit. NL #yBlock: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.
#yActivate #yIce, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yIce #yDamage: Applies #yChill on hit.
#yBlock: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.

ShadowSiren:ShadowDamage.NAME: Shadow
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and causes the target to lose HP equal to their #yShadow #ySplit. NL #yBlock: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.
#yActivate #yShadow, imbuing your next Elementless Attack with #yShadow #yDamage: Ignores #yBlock and causes the target to lose HP equal to their #yShadow #ySplit.
#yBlock: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:ElementallyInert.NAME: Inert
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Can not deal #yElemental damage.

ShadowSiren:IceBlock.NAME: Ice Shield [ShadowSiren:IceIcon]
ShadowSiren:IceBlock.DESCRIPTION: Attackers take damage equal to their #yChill.

ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.NAME: Sticky Block
ShadowSiren:StickyBlock.DESCRIPTION: Only reduced by #b1 at the start of turn.

ShadowSiren:FireBlock.NAME: Fire Shield [ShadowSiren:FireIcon]
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked, deals #b
[FireIcon] damage to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.NAME: Shadow Shield [ShadowSiren:DarkIcon]
ShadowSiren:ShadowBlock.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, applies 3 #yShadow #ySplit to the attacker.

ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.NAME: Electric Shield [ShadowSiren:ElectricIcon]
ShadowSiren:ElectricBlock.DESCRIPTION: Applies #yShock to the attacker when this Block is damaged. Used #bbefore other Block types.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When attacking, deal a secondary #b
[ElectricIcon] damage. When attacked, deals #b
[ElectricIcon] damage back.
